channel.title: Geek Stuff
channel.itunes:subtitle: All geek, all the time.
channel.itunes:author: Big Kev
channel.itunes:summary: Geeks of the world rejoice! Finally an uncensored view of the Comic Book, Toy, Film and Collectibles industries featuring indepth conversations, reviews and news every week!

item.title: Episode I
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The very first episode of Big Kev's Geek Stuff!
item.itunes:summary: Geeks of the world rejoice! Finally an uncensored view of the Comic Book, Toy, Film and Collectibles industries featuring reknowned geek Big Kev!

item.title: Episode 2
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Search for Episode 3
item.itunes:summary: "V For Vendetta" film/book comparison, "Pirates of the Spanish Main" collectible minitures game discussed, "Star Wars Unleashed" mourned . . . and MORE!

item.title: Episode 3
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 3-D
item.itunes:summary: Harry Potter by Tonner Inc... Matt and Kevin discuss their Pirates of the Spanish Main contest... The guys mourn the loss of Toyfare Magazine's effectivness... and MORE... in glorious 3-D!

item.title: Episode 4 Part 1
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 4 The Revenge
item.itunes:summary: This time its personal!

item.title: Episode 4 Part 2
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 4 The Revenge
item.itunes:summary: This time its personal!

item.title: Episode 5
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Dream Child
item.itunes:summary: Listen as we take on the myth that toys are still made for children by discussing kids toy lines with collector appeal. We also premiere a new segment, Angry Dans Random Rant, a full supply of news, and much, much more!

item.title: Episode 6
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Undiscovered Country
item.itunes:summary: This episode the boys explore independent toys and trends as well as fan films and shows - top it off with a full dose of news and more!

item.title: Episode 7
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Generations
item.itunes:summary: Whats old is new again - the boys cover all your old favorites (and not-so-favorites) that have been raised from the dead for the current retro revival.

item.title: Episode 8
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Treasure Hunters
item.itunes:summary: Can it be - black costumed Spider-man? Stan Lee gets a reality show and the boys wax nostalgic Dungeons and Dragons.

item.title: Episode 9
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Thou Shalt Not Bear False Witness
item.itunes:summary: E3 has come and gone and we survey the damage - to your wallet! X3 looms on the horizon, will it suck as much as Catwoman and Elektra?

item.title: Episode X
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Its just X
item.itunes:summary: Wizard's 100 Greatest trade paperbacks of all time and other musings. Retailer X drops in a freaks everyone out with his ethereal vocals.

item.title: Episode 11
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Catching Up
item.itunes:summary: Ron Weasley comes alive and escapes from his packaging, Shocker, the Ghost Rider trailer, and the many disturbing images of the studio freak out Fantastic.

item.title: Episode 12
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Apocalypse Wave
item.itunes:summary: Super Stretching Mr. Fantastic bleeds non-toxic corn syrup, Pirates of the Caribbean action figures have an identity crisis and the Geek Stuff X-Men 3 review.

item.title: Episode 13
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Hermes' Unlucky Onslaught
item.itunes:summary: Obituaries, the story behind Miracleman, the coming of Galactus, Spider-man reveals himself, and the gay Bat.

item.title: Episode 14
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Memento
item.itunes:summary: Pirates of the Spanish Main: The Curse of Davy Jones, You'll Have That, Twilight Turtle haunts the dreams of Baby Fantastic and Marvel 1602 disappoints everyone.

item.title: Episode 15
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The One About Girls
item.itunes:summary: Listener love (hate) mail, Marvel just isn't that good, the WoW Funeral Massacre, and the off base mainstream analysis that is the Starz Comic Books on Film mockumentary.

item.title: Episode 16
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Too Darn Hot
item.itunes:summary: The Transformers teaser, Sandman maybe kills Uncle Ben, Wonder Woman soars in from Baliwood, a handful of terrible celebrity impersonations, and we once again tackle the Starz Comic Books on Film travesty.

item.title: Episode 17
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: F'in Hollywood
item.itunes:summary: Geek Stuff goes to Hollywood and packs a bag full of criticism for the big screen bastardizations of the great comics of our time. Also, a Dragonlance animated movie, the return of the Joker, ToyBiz Marvel Legends, Sideshow Premium format Anakin Skywalker and Matt proves he has an excellent memory for action figures.

item.title: Episode 18
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Replacements
item.itunes:summary: Lucky, Ken, Matt, and Mr. Fan hold down the ship while Kev reports in from Cali.

item.title: Episode 19
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: There And Back Again
item.itunes:summary: Big Kev returns to lay waste on those who betrayed the show in his absense, Sandman, more ToyBiz Legends, Heath Ledger is the Joker, and the Neil Gaiman panel discussion.

item.title: Episode 20
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: One Geek Shy
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Mr. Fantastic are left One Geek Shy as Big Kev ventures onto the battlefield of Pennsic War. Katie Holmes beams, Favreau is doing Iron Man,So You Want to Be A Superhero, LEGO Exo-Force and Mindstorms, and we dip into the Secret Stash for some BitTorrent comic book action.

item.title: Episode 21
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Back In the Saddle
item.itunes:summary: Kev returns bloodied from the battleground of Pennsic, Hollywoodland, Looney Toons figures, god forsaken twist ties, Fantastic Four series 2, Dead Rising for Xbox 360 and Kev Hates Katamari.

item.title: Episode 22
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Same Thing We Do Every Week
item.itunes:summary: The Pinky and the Brain interview, Civil War delayed, Heath Ledger as the Joker, Gojira its Godzilla to you 2 disc box set, Linda Carter statue, and DC Direct Elseworlds Wave 2 leaves Fantastic crying NARF!

item.title: Episode 23
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to the Future
item.itunes:summary: Katherine McPhee as Wonder Woman, The Green Arrow on Smallville, the Ultimate X-Men Best Buy compilation DVD, Retailer X stops by, and more Transformers MOVIE!

item.title: Episode 24
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The One With Jim Lee...'s Voicemail
item.itunes:summary: Peter Jackson doesn't know he's doing The Hobbit, Star Wars the New Old Version on DVD, Sideshow Bespin Han Solo, Mace Windu has 2 sabres, ToyFare sucks again and Jim Lee's Uncanny Voicemail.

item.title: Episode 25
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Chasing Jimly
item.itunes:summary: The many voices of Kev, Rachel Bilson is freaking HOT, an Avengers movie, Heath hates comics, new DC Directs, Narnia, Beta Ray is back, and of course, Jim Lee.

item.title: Episode 26
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Spirit of Steve Irwin
item.itunes:summary: Boba Fett WAS the man, the Isis Report, WETA Digital Surfs Silver, the Greatest American Hero DVD box set, World War Hulk is happening and what happens when the registration bandwagon hits Cleave-land? Brian Lynch joins us on the phone as we say good-bye in our own way to Steve Irwin the Croc Hunter, the Wildlife Warrior and Animal Geek.

item.title: Episode 27
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Matt's Bachelor Party
item.itunes:summary: Tony Stark is a drunk, Galactus will appear in Fantastic 42, Peanuts math, Evil Dead the Musical, Blade canceled and gets a DVD set, parents cant handle Megatron, Fragile Things, Coraline, Iron Fist, Ant Man, Tonner Hermione, Firebolt and others, and the Bad Mother Canucker stops in to talk wrasslin.

item.title: Episode 29
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Mystery of Episode 28
item.itunes:summary: Live Free or Die Hard, Heroes spoilers, Moon Knight TV series and Legends Wave 15, Marvel Masterworks and Icons, Arm and Hand Galactus, Ultimate Marvel vs. Marvel Proper, how to fix your old Joes, Mezco is kicking ass and taking names, and you really got to try typing Rob Liefeld into google if you want a good laugh. Its a long one but hey, its been a while.

item.title: Episode 30
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Endless Wire
item.itunes:summary: Thousand dollar debit cards to all audience members, Kingdom Come Series II, Wolverine, Speed Racer, and Halo movies, Red Sonja turns 35, Dynamics Forces, Ultimate Hawkeye kills people with guns, South Park WOW, Massive magazine and MORE!

item.title: Episode 34
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Nightcrawler Weeps
item.itunes:summary: Nightcrawler weeps for Dave Cockrum, Hobbit movie questions, Lord of the Rings prequel, Pretty Old Men in Pink, DC Direct Batman Black and White, we dive into The Archives, Clerks II Dvd Mega-Mooby Meal gift set, An Evening with Kevin Smith 2 - Evening Harder, Buffy comic coming, Nintendo Wii safety tips, and will all of you please stop waiting to see Firefly? All this and more sponsored by Shadowflame, coming in February!

item.title: Episode 35
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Battle of Episode 35
item.itunes:summary: History Channels Civil War A Nation Divided, Beverly Hills Cop 4, more Watchman info, is Adam Hughes designing?, Childs Play comic, McFarlanes Dragons, Dungeons and Dragons Animated Series complete DVD set with Best Buy exclusive figurine, Preacher series may be one ep per issue, Megatron images, Star Wars Saga Wave 7 is a colorful array of Clone Troopers, Crisis on Infinite Earth Series 3 and Big Kev sets the human race back 160 years.

item.title: Episode 36
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Screwed
item.itunes:summary: Goodbye to Diane from Sideshow, Where's Bahamut?, the Shadow Stormtrooper is Unleashed, Stardust collectibles, Dollar Store Pirates, The Shadow, Punisher 2 info, Angelina's hot in Sin City 2, the Wonder Woman movie again, FLANvention, Kaylee's also hot, and we ask the question: has Kev even seen Firefly?

item.title: Episode 37
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas
item.itunes:summary: Watch out for flying Wii Remotes, there's a tongue in the archive, Fantastic may leave the house, Del Toro Tarzan, Pan's Labrinyth is supposed to be violent, Rodriguez's Madman film, Dark Tower and Stephen King at Comicon, new Pirates shots, finally a Transformers trailer, numerous geek DVD releases including Voltron volume 2, SOTA's Now Playing Series III, and then we all get together and sing Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer. No, Really.

item.title: Episode 38
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: And The Winner Is
item.itunes:summary: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Optimus Prime speaks, SectorSeven.com, Fantastic Four Surfer trailer, Rob Zombie's Halloween Remake featuring McDowell and Mane, Wachowski's Speed Racer maybe with Keanu, and the 2006 Geeky's.

item.title: Episode 39
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: A Very Special Episode
item.itunes:summary: Its an absolute goof. Without this episode the XM show would be an awkward number. We avoid copyright infringement, Kev strokes his ego, and we got some beef with Brian Lynch.

item.title: Episode 40 - Visit www.BigKevsGeekStuff.com to download this episode!
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The XM Experience
item.itunes:summary: Visit www.BigKevsGeekStuff.com to download Episode 40 - The XM Experience! Geek Stuff as featured on XM Channel 202 with John Romita Jr. drawing in the studio and Brian Harnois from Sci-fi Channels Ghosthunters on the line. Indy 4 is a go, Angelinas in Sin City 2, your Xbox 360 is (probably) obsolete, and SideShow Lords of the Sith Darth Maul. This ones dedicated to Diane with a big thanks to Opie and Anthony, Eric Logan, XM Satellite Radio and E-rock.

item.title: Episode 41
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: After Shockzz
item.itunes:summary: You tell us who will play Trixie, Diamond Select 24, the end of Stars Wars Mr. Potato Head, the birth of Optimash Prime and the Spider Spud, the voice of Megatron, Proto-formers, Pirates vs. Ninjas by Antarctic Press, the TMNT CGI, Toy Biz Indy Legends, Judge Death, M. Nights Airbender, Sam Raimi on Spidey 4, Halle Barry still sucks, various Accoutrements products including Captain Danger and Cubes Corporate Zombies. Oh, and New Line tells Jackson to go eff himself.

item.title: Episode 42
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Life, the Universe, and Everything
item.itunes:summary: Preacher script draft, the Force is with Galactus, Paltrow Pepper Potts, movie Iron man armor is Civil War armor, Rob Zombie pisses off fans with more boobs, less pysche, 24 MacFarlane and Diamond Select, DC Direct WoW figs, Thors GIANT Axe, Danger Mouse statues, SideShow 12 inch movie figures, Zootflys Ghostbusters prototype without a license, and DC Direct JSA Series I.

item.title: Episode 43
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Meatballs
item.itunes:summary: Anne Hathaway and The Rock Get Smart, Civil War 7 delayed cus its too big, Spidey 4 being penciled, Kevin Spacy is back for a new Super movie, Rob Zombie reworks it, Mouse Guard from Diamond Select, Firefly Visual Companion 2, yet another Pirates expansion, Star Wars 7 packs, Sideshow Buffy-verse Lorn and Cordelia, and the Hasbro Annihilus Legends line. This one goes out to Bam Bam.

item.title: Episode 44
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Vincible Iron Man
item.itunes:summary: A real Hobbit skull is found, new Ghost in the Shell, Mikey has no chucks, Hellboy animated feature, 300 in IMAX, McFarlane Grinch, Radcliffe bares all, Mezco's Underdog, Diamond Select Zombies, Formers rumors of iPods and triple changers, the Invincible Iron Man animated DVD, and the Bad Mother Canucker makes an entrance.

item.title: Episode 45
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Accents
item.itunes:summary: Adrian of Action-Figure.com joins us pre-Toy Fair, Weatherman greets from Antarctica, Wizkids Halo Action Clicks, new Hulk is an Abomination, Joel Schumacher Sandman, Mouse Guard figs coming up, Indy 4 has a start date with a CGI whip, some Toy Fair speculation, and the Action Figure Chop Shop.

item.title: Episode 46
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Valentine's Day
item.itunes:summary: Adrian The Foreigner Faulkner and the boys recall times long past, Galactus is MIA, a monument to Balboa, Wolfman movie, George Brewer from DC Direct calls in, Arndt you going to see Toy Story 3? and other Disney films, Jaws 5 direct to DVD, The Return of Spies Like Us, Metal Gear the movie, Matt finally gets a Wii, as well as all that we loved from Toy Fair.

item.title: Episode 47
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Sound Bites
item.itunes:summary: Matt from Automattic Comics joins us in the studio as we ask such mind bending questions as, Do kids want smaller toys? and, Why would you ever stop making Star Wars Unleashed?. Includes interviews with Hasbro, Tonner, DC Direct and David Petersen, author of the excellent Mouse Guard.

item.title: Episode 48 - Visit www.BigKevsGeekStuff.com to download this episode!
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Return
item.itunes:summary: Our second show on XM Satellite radio including Kevin Smith!

item.title: Episode 49
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome Back
item.itunes:summary: Heroes Season 1, Hellboy Blood and Iron, Peter Pan Platinum Edition, South Park Season 9, Arkan Gets Smart, Mark Wahlberg as Duke, new Spider-man toon, Mighty Avengers numero uno, lots of Playmates TMNT movie line pieces, the Toy Fair Top Ten, and oh yeah, Captain America is dead for now.

item.title: Episode 50
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Just Episode 50
item.itunes:summary: Joss does Buffy comic arcs, Buffy Omnibus in 7 volumes, who is the son of Indiana, new Serenity comic, Jason Lee Chipmunks, Hellboy Sword of Storms Bustups, Escape from New York remake, Kev has 100 bucks on Gerard Butler as the comedian, Casino Royal DVD release with Best Buy exclusive, Jeff Bridges as Stone in Iron Man, New Line and DC Shazam, Watchmen screenshot and Torri Spelling gives birth to a demon.

item.title: Episode 51
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Size Matters
item.itunes:summary: IDW Star Trek Klingons Blood Will Tell, Escape from New York prequel?, Runaways Loners spinoff, New Line Gears movie, Vivid Imagination, BBC Robin Hood figures, no one misses Captain America, Shatner Roast on DVD, DC Direct Elseworlds Series 3 and the New Goblin rides a snow board to terrorize his foes.

item.title: Episode 52
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Passover
item.itunes:summary: The Anniversary episode explodes with Jet Lis Mummy 3, Heroes painting auction for epilepsy, whos gonna be the next Captain America?, Fallen Sun Death of Cap in 5 Stages of Grief, Tyler Mane maybe returning as the Tooth, Barricade speaks, Kev has Happy Feet, Children of Men by Clive Owen, ALL NUDE Emma Watson ALL NUDE, The Children of Urine, SOTA does Now Playing up good, Mr. Fantastic bites the dust, and John-Es Top 10 Child Actresses from 80s TV Shows Who Grew Up To Be Hotties as seen on UpstandingCitizens.com.

item.title: Episode 53
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Physical
item.itunes:summary: Duchovny needs work, Namor returns, Ratner kills Wolverine, Angus presents Jim Lee Batman Black and White and more DC Direct, National Treasure sequel players, Spiderman takes on Red Sonya, talent agrees to Spidey 4, Dragon Pool Hellboy novel, Cap dies again, Stickman, and Mars Needs Moms. Ugly Dolls storm the studio while we review our own list of Hot Chicks in Geek Related Television Productions on Television Only But Can Still Be In A Made For Television Movie or Commercial as Long As It Has Fantastical Elements but Is Not 24 Because That Also Has Terrorism. Simple.

item.title: Episode 54
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Beat The Clock
item.itunes:summary: Goodman is Speeds Dad, World War Hulk, Hellboy 2 and PVC set, Booster Gold is back, Green Arrow in Supermax, Runaways Loners spin off, Complete Peanuts volume 423901, possible split for Grindhouse, Pirate Primer, Superheros Museum, Li and Chan in Forbidden Kingdom, Wasteland by Oni Press, go watch Ryan vs Dorkman 2, DC Direct Supe and Bat series, and Fantastic prunes his nappy headed afro.

item.title: Episode 55
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Glorious South
item.itunes:summary: Kev cant shake his Foghorn accent after returning from the backwater states, Iron Man movie images, DC World War III, Ricci in Speed Racer, Fishburn as Galactus, Norton as Bruce Banner, Toy Museum at Natural Bridge, Hobo Heaths Joker, Nintendo Wii Browser, new Halo 2 maps, Disneys Prince of Persia, Movies in Virginia, Ryan vs. Dorkman 2, and the ultimate geek to mainstream - NBCs Heroes.

item.title: Episode 56
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: One For The Space Time Continuum
item.itunes:summary: No gray Hulk, Heath Joker pics, Spidey musical, Fallen Sun Avengers, Spike Asylum trade, real Kryptonite, Matt Fox as Racer X, Dark Horse Serenity lunch box, Tolkiens maps on display, Robot Chicken Star Wars spoof, Raimi will do more Web Head, Force Unleashed pushed back, LotR Online, Super Paper Mario and Halo 3 leaked footage. Walmart pumps HD-DVD while Brother Billy chimes in on the Holy Folks.

item.title: Episode 57
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Frankenstein
item.itunes:summary: Kevs brain springs a leak, Iron Mans suit, Eric Roberts, Fallen Son captain America, Rodriguez Jetsons, maybe Josh Holloway as Gambit, Pans Labyrinth transmitido en espanol en SAP, Voltron Green Lion, Heroes DVD hits soon, Monster Squad has nards, new stupid Silver Surfer Legends, Tonner and Sideshow Team Up, new figures galore, LOST ends in 20xx, Mouse Guard Vol 1, Starman drops in on our Spidey 3 review, and Kevin from Meltdown Customs takes on Night Owl.

item.title: Episode 58
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Haha!
item.itunes:summary: Heaths torn mouth and green hair, Anthony Michael Hall in Batman, No more Tom Jayne Punisher, More Termie movies, Frank Chos Jungle Girl, Sarah Connor Chronicles, Flash Gordon gets more characters, Endangered Species, Necca Princess Bride, LucasFilms and Master Replicas goes seperate ways, Afro Samurai figures delayed, 80 GB PlayStation 3, StarCraft II announcement, Emma Frost Comicquette by Sideshow, Hasbro Shadow Trooper Unleashed, and Infinite Crisis Series II is NOT funny.

item.title: Episode 59
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Show Must Go On
item.itunes:summary: Kev goes AWOL, more on the Street Fighter and He-man films, legit Joker shots for Dark Knight, all about IMAX, no love for Hannibal, Celebration 4, all these Clone Wars is confusing, The Burger King can do anything, Clone Trooper Unleashed reissue, Diamond Select Inara, Mario Party 8 and drunken Wario Ware mayhem, Cigna Cancer Killer game, and yes, we know it wasnt Burgess Meredith.

item.title: Episode 60
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Still Missing In Action
item.itunes:summary: For someone as big as Kev you would think hed be easier to find. We discuss Optimash Prime, BBC Robin Hood DVD, Chips, Fantastic Four Extended Edition, Death movie directed by Neal Gaiman, Shadowrun on 360 and Vista, October Toys Gwin Army invades your desktop and Hogwarts gets blown to pieces.

item.title: Episode 61
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Return of Duck King
item.itunes:summary: Turns out Kev was sitting there the whole time. Terry Brooks movie, Connery not in Indy 4, Thundercats, Sam Jackson in Spirit, DC Black Dossier League of Extra Gents, Veronica Mars Comic, Hellboy Blood and Iron, Ghost Rider DVDs, The Mice Templar 50-pager, RIP Don Herbert, Twilight Turtle goes stolen and a whole load more.

item.title: Episode 62
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Too Cool for the Room
item.itunes:summary: Fantastic, Too Cool, and OG take listener advice. Will Nathan Fillion be in the Watchmen? Were split on the new Batsuit and is the Batpod really an Autobot? Wrath of the Titans, the next Fallen Son and Jackstaff. Keeping up with Heroes, Corgi gets Nintendo, McFarlane gets Halo and Hasbro get Indy 4. Blockbuster says goodbye to Hi-Def and Kev rehashes old comments. Mattels San Diego presentation and what is the future of their DC line?

item.title: Episode 63
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Too Darn Hot... Again
item.itunes:summary: The Astromech Droid for Pediatric Cancer, Mezco Comic Book Abe Sapien, Laid to Rest, Underdog, Copper Bones, Raimi wants Sinister Six, Sam Jackson is Nick Fury, Magneto movie, Purple Joker mobile, Where the Wild Things Are by Spike Jonze, 24 Femme Pres, and the Bad Mother Canucker.

item.title: Episode 64
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: More Than Meets the Eye
item.itunes:summary: Breaking Atmo, iPhone chat, Roundtree in Speed Racer, Rorshachs journal, Kingdom Come Reactivated, Knights of the Dinner Table, Transformers talk and more riveting Geek Stuff.

item.title: Episode 65
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Big Kevs Geek Stuff and the Sorcerers Secret Fire of Azkaban
item.itunes:summary: The most absurdly titled episode comes at ya with Cloverfield, Justice League, Supe Returns, Indy 4, more Kill Bill, Gaimans M is for Magic, Neca Cult Classic Series 6 Lost Boys, DC Direct and Mattel, Wildstorm Friday the 13th Pamelas Tale is very interesting, and Dynamic Forces posters are on good paper but are more expensive than before. Microsoft finally admits big blunder and ponies up the cash for returns while Sony breaks price on PS3.

item.title: Episode 66
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Almost the Beast
item.itunes:summary: Emulation is news to Kev, e3 sucks, Metal Men series, Altered Beast, Anthony Michael Hall as Riddler, Warner Bros. Watchmen synopsis, maybe more Indy, DCs 30 essential graphic novels, Ray Park as Iron Fist, Bendis renews contract, the Top 10 Super Villians, DC Direct Elseworlds 4, and Tonner super fabulous Aquaman.

item.title: Episode 67
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: San Diego
item.itunes:summary: OG Matt, Ken, and Fantastic hold court while Big Kev does a recon mission in San Diego.

item.title: Episode 68
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: No Place Like Home
item.itunes:summary: OG Matt returns from San Diego with a diary chock full of stories while Big Kev roams the Bizarro World in search of the future of Star Wars Galaxies. Fantastic stands by in awe.

item.title: Episode 69
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Alllll Right
item.itunes:summary: George Miller directing JLA, Alexanders Punisher 2, WoW Movie, Shrek 4, BlizzCon, Wolfenstein film, Dean Cain on Smallville and Wizard Universes Top 25 Cliffhangers of All Time.

item.title: Episode 70
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome Back... Again
item.itunes:summary: Voltron, GI Joe gets director, New Line and Peter Jackson, Mattel recall, DC 6 inch waves, DVD releases including Labrinyth and Dark Crystal, Green Arrow Year One, Spike Shadow Puppets, Marvel Ultimate Universe crossover, Pirates pirates interview, San Diego exclusive stand outs and so much more it will make your head asplode.

item.title: Episode 76
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Helmets
item.itunes:summary: Kev visits the Secret Stash and comes in second place while wearing the Rocketeer helmet, the Voltron Red Lion, Knocked Up, Star Trek TNG, Superman Doomsday Animated and Figures, Justice League II, Smallville II, Batman Statue, Biel as Wonderwoman, Batman The Killing Joke Deluxe, Hellboy Hardcover, X-Men Disassembled, and of course the Halo 3 Legendary box set.

item.title: Episode 78
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Third Time's the Charm
item.itunes:summary: Geek Stuff is back on XM Channel 202 - The Virus!

item.title: Episode 79
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: A Quick One
item.itunes:summary: Rambo goes to Hell and Back, McCoy and Kirk cast AGAIN!, Vorhees cameo on Supernatural, SCUD final 4, an interview with Ridley Scott, Marvel Select Zombies Hulk, Kevin Smith Heroes ep, and Side Show suggests you let the Wookie win with the Star Wars chess set.

item.title: Episode 80
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Misery
item.itunes:summary: Kev asks: Are Mego's even action figures? followed by a scientific examination of Kenner Star Wars light sabers. Millar dissed, Justice League movie, Cap movie, Angels and Demons, DVD reviews, Kev finally tries WoW, and the unconditional love of Albus Dumbledore.

item.title: Episode 81
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Matt Left?
item.itunes:summary: We do the Diamond Select Flux Capacitor, Wonder Woman on hold, Hellboy 2, Hulk movie, Jet Li as an Asian Mummy 3, Alanis in Dick movie, Ratner not escaping, Whedon on FOX, Jim Lee Batman Black and White, Star Wars Disney characters, Hasbro Battlefront II Battlepacks, October Toys Pocket Full of Posiez, KotR Handbook vol 1, Wildstorm's Freddy vs. Jason vs. Ash, and Kev's movie of the decade: Ratatouille.

item.title: Episode 82
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: XM 202 with Sam Jones and Melody Anderson
item.itunes:summary: Coming at you straight from XM Channel 202. We're live in studio with Sam Jones and Melody Anderson talking about the newly minted, doubly signed and numbered, Limited Edition DVD Commentary. Big Kev, OG Matt, Fantastic and Erock take the weekly dive into the latest happenings in the geek world and talk with Flash Gordon aficionado Bob Lindenmayer. Big thanks to Eric Logan, Opie and Anthony, XM Satellite Radio, Erock, Digital Press of Clifton, NJ and of course... AlphaGraphics of Montclair.

item.title: Episode 83
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Mario Can Breathe In the Vacuum of Space
item.itunes:summary: Potter castings, The Tales of Beedle the Bard, Kev bids 28 thousand on an Alex Ross, Christian Bale in Terminator 4, new Indy imagery with The Boof clad in full leather, Joker takes the cover of Empire, Gaslight returns, golden age heroes wore skirts, Sienna Miller as the Baroness, Wizkids NEW Pirates of the Caribbean Pocket Model Game, the Wii Zapper, and nude lipstick lesbians invade the studio.

item.title: Episode 84
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Epic Adventure or Battle of 84

item.title: Episode 86
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: The Christmas Episode
item.itunes:summary: Dark Knight trailers, Wolverine movie, Dragon Ball Zzzzz, Jackson's Hobbit is finally a go, Stardust and Simpsons DVDs, and Reggie promises you a Wii... certificate. Kev says to have the The Dark Knight trailer cued up for the end of the show - so do it!

item.title: Episode 87
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: Spider-BAD
item.itunes:summary: No Arnie in new Termie sequel trilogy, WETA brings Justice, more new Joes including Marlon, Iron Man filming news, Moore signs the Watchman away, and whatever you do... don't open Forbidden Heroes E-mails.

item.title: Episode 88
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: I Have A Crush On Shauna Perry
item.itunes:summary: Apple welcomes you to 1986 with movie rentals, 2 Deathly Hallows, Wolvie movie news, da Smurfs, da Fett confirmed for Stars Wars TV, and Big Kev visits his Heaven on Earth - Tonner! Plus MORE!

item.title: Episode 91
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: It's About Aliens, But That Has Nothing To Do With DC

item.title: Episode 94
item.itunes:author: Big Kev
item.itunes:subtitle: XM 5
item.itunes:summary: Geek Stuff makes its 5th LIVE! appearance on XM Satellite Radio Channel 202 - The Virus! We talk: Live Action Akira, board game movies, Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Undead, Fanboys, Prince of Persia, and Alice movies, Dom Mon joins Wolvie flick, Harley Quinn, Star Wars Unleashed, a special call in from Justice League: New Frontier's Darwyn Cooke, and a whole lot more! No joke!
